snippet: Secretary of State Rex Tillerson has agreed in principle to a White House proposal to slash foreign aid and diplomatic spending by 37 percent, but wants to spread it out over three years rather than in one dramatic cut....

headline.main: Man Arrested After Attack on Homeless Person 'Decoy'
headline.print_headline: Man Arrested After Attack on Homeless Person 'Decoy'

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Rex Tillerson has agreed in principle to a White House proposal to slash foreign aid and diplomatic spending by 37 percent, but wants to spread it out over three years rather than in one dramatic cut.
